--------------------------------------------------
Dear All,

 

Kindly be informed that we have a store closure for Renovation of  “Lacoste MCC last trading date on Wed 10th Sep 2025 and Handover on 13th Sep 2025.

 

You are kindly requested to complete your tasks for smooth closure and arrange the store closure needs as per the individual tasks within the given time frame,

*	@Group Security Control Room <mailto:GroupSecurityControlRoom@chalhoub.com>  @Rizaldy Amada <mailto:Rizaldy.Amada@chalhoub.com>  @Real UAE - Logistics - Distribution <mailto:RealUAE-Logistics-Distribution@mailmac.net>  Please share the documentation at the earliest to store email to apply for permits.

*	Apply for Work Mall/police permit (return stocks, transfer / stock packing/ IT Equipment CCTV dismantling) @Lacoste Mirdiff City Center <mailto:Lacoste.MirdiffCityCenter@chalhoub.com> @Fadi MohamadBasha <mailto:Fadi.Mohamadbasha@chalhoub.com> 
*	Deposit Petty cash & Cash Float in separate deposit bags and EOD cash in a different bag on 9th Sep . @Fadi MohamadBasha <mailto:Fadi.Mohamadbasha@chalhoub.com> @Lacoste Mirdiff City Center <mailto:Lacoste.MirdiffCityCenter@chalhoub.com> 
*	Credit card machine with manual invoice book to be kept with @Fadi MohamadBasha <mailto:Fadi.Mohamadbasha@chalhoub.com>  until the reopening.
